name: codeceptjs-docker
description: End to end tests for WordPress using CodeceptJS

scripts.stop-containers: docker stop selenium codeceptjs || true && docker rm selenium codeceptjs || true
scripts.docker: docker run -it --rm -v $PWD:/tests/ -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -e HOST=selenium-hub --link selenium-hub:selenium-hub --net grid codeception/codeceptjs codeceptjs run-multiple parallel --profile 'normal'
scripts.codeceptjs-docker: docker run --net grid --link selenium-hub:selenium-hub -v $(pwd):/tests -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -e NODE_ICU_DATA=node_modules/full-icu -e HOST=selenium-hub -e profile=normal -e CODECEPT_ARGS='--grep @one' nexus.booxdev.com:8443/codeceptjs:v1.0.0
scripts.local-docker: npm run stop-containers && npm run docker
